message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its importance to you, I understand its worth is $12,000 to you. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to help you maximize your investment while ensuring you benefit from our product's unique features. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
